name: World War I io (opoly)
description:
World War I io is a property trading board game about World War I. World War I pitted all the world's great powers against each other. Two opposing sides emerged: The Allies (the United Kingdom, France, United States, and the Russian Empire) and the Central Powers of Germany, Austria-Hungary, and the Ottoman Empire.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
